.. _wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers.RadioButtonHandler:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers.RadioButtonHandler**
==========================================================================================================================================

Supports saving/restoring a :class:`RadioButton` state.

This class handles the following wxPython widgets:

- :class:`RadioButton`.



|

|api| Class API
===============


.. class:: RadioButtonHandler(AbstractHandler)

   Supports saving/restoring a :class:`RadioButton` state.
   
   This class handles the following wxPython widgets:
   
   - :class:`RadioButton`.
